# Tender Announcement

## Title
**Economic Modelling and Analysis for Community Profiles**

## Reference
cb-8830-74023937

## Tender Information

- **Solicitation Number**: CIC-156753
- **Publication Date**: 2023-09-07
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-17T15:00:00

## Tender Status
The tender for this project has expired.

## Project Description

The Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) invites tenderers to provide economical modelling and analysis services to create short community profiles (up to 3 pages) for the Immigration Matters initiative. The project aims to promote immigration and dispel common myths. The community profiles will provide an economic overview, including:

- Community strengths
- Infrastructure and challenges
- Opportunities for growth and development
- Labour shortage statistics
- Top employment sectors
- Role of immigration in community growth and development

These profiles will be used to promote informed conversations on the importance of immigration across Canada. The Government of Canada aims to attract newcomers to different regions, including small towns and rural communities.

## Tender Requirements

- Tenderers must provide economical modelling and analysis services
- Community profiles will be published on the Immigration Matters website
- Profiles will be shared through IRCC social media channels and communicated to IRCC collaborators and stakeholders

## Evaluation Criteria

- Tenderers will be evaluated based on technical merit and price

## Contract Information

- The contract will be awarded based on the combined rating of technical merit and price
- The contract will be awarded to the tenderer with the highest combined rating
